svg.title: ICE-02: Cross-Platform AI Development Ecosystem
svg.desc: Comprehensive ecosystem diagram showing integration of all five principles across multiple development platforms, tools, and environments with unified context and workflow orchestration.
svg.text: Unified Five-Principle Integration Across All Platforms

g.text: Live Share: 12 users • Context Sync: 100% • Conflicts: 0
